external_games.name: 通天之井The Well of Heaven-Reaching

name: The Well of Heaven-Reaching
storyline: The goal is to reach the top of the Well of Heaven-reaching! Although the Well of Heaven-reaching has caused countless people to fail, it can't stop you from wanting to conquer it. Here, you'll have to navigate through all sorts of interesting obstacles and traps. You will meet all kinds of people who have had different experiences at the Well of Heaven-reaching. Their stories are tortuous and interesting, yet contradictory to each other. You climb to the top of the Well of Heaven-reaching with doubts, and there are answers.
summary: the Well of Heaven-reaching is a platforming game. Choose from a variety of jumps where you'll need to make your way through traps and obstacles to reach the top of the Well of Heaven-reaching.
